description:
As Yuuya and the others head for the outside, the squad chasing them summon Goyou monsters cornering them! They`re trapped with seemingly no way out, then Gonegenzaka and Kurosaki appear!! With perfect teamwork, Yuuya and the others counter-attack. Just as they think they`ve finally escaped, Security chief Rojet appears to block their way...!!
Source: crunchyroll
